name: Space Jump (Sheri)
description:
Can you complete this challenging 2D Platformer?

Can you defeat Galactoid the Galactipus

Can you get the most amount of points?

Play Space Jump today.

Space jump was made in 1 month by me, an indie game developer

The full game costs £2.00 but if you want to test out the free trial, Click Here

Website: https://sheriyarnawaz.github.io/SpaceJump/

Controls:

W & A - Move right and left

Space - Jump

Mouse Click - Shoot/Select

p - Pause Game

Feedback

Please leave feedback in the discussion board below

How To Download

Simply download the executable file, run through the installation process and play Space Jump. If your on mac, simply unzip the file
